name: Bubble Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Bubble Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the Bubble Data API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the Bubble Data API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: object

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get

typeName.name: typeName
typeName.description: Name of data type of the object to create
typeName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type Name | 作用: Name of data type of the object to create | (必填项)

properties.name: properties
properties.natural_language_description: 参数名: Properties | 默认值: {}

objectId.name: objectId
objectId.description: ID of the object to update
objectId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Object ID | 作用: ID of the object to update | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: False

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: filtersJson (值: None) - Refine the list that is returned by the Data API with search constraints, exactly as you define a search in Bubble. See link.
